value.title: How to use multiple url filters with Power BI reports

value.title: How to use the Power BI Aggregations Feature
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam sits down with Christian Wade to discuss how to use the Power BI Aggregations feature. This video will show you the clicks to get to the clicky clicky draggy droppy awesomeness when working with big data, or even massive data. value.title: Install and configure Power BI Report Server (May 2017 Preview)
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how to install and configure the May 2017 Preview of Power BI Report Server. Power BI Report Server has a new standalone install experience and this product allows for Power BI reports to be rendered in the web portal along with paginated reports. value.title: Intro to aggregates in T-SQL
value.excerpt: Getting started with T-SQL? Patrick looks at using aggregate functions within your statements to help get the right results. If you are just starting with T-SQL in either Azure SQL Database or Azure Synapse Analytics, this is for you! value.title: OData Differences within Power BI and how to refresh your data!
value.excerpt: Last week we looked at the O365 Bubble and how we use Authentication to go in and out.  This week we show it in action!  We will look at one of the limitations to the existing Power BI service and how we can actually use the new Power BI Preview service to refresh data from an OData feed using oAuth

value.title: Personal Gateway governance in Power BI

value.title: Power BI Auditing

value.title: Power BI For Report Consumers

value.title: Power BI User lookup with the gateway using Active Directory
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can use Active Directory custom attributes for the user lookup with the Power BI Gateway. This can be used for both Analysis Services mapping and the Kerberos SSO with DirectQuery connections.
